parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Whosoever, whichsoever, whatsoever.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From epi and ginosko; to know upon some mark, i.e. Recognize; by implication, to become fully acquainted with, to acknowledge.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
From dikaioo; an equitable deed; by implication, a statute or decision.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
(including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Worthy, worthy of, deserving, comparable, suitable. Probably from ago; deserving, comparable or suitable.
Death, physical or spiritual. From thnesko; death.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Alone, but, only. Neuter of monos as adverb; merely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From sun and eudokeo; to think well of in common, i.e. Assent to, feel gratified with.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
